name: Shark Beach - 2048 Saga
description:
Welcome to Shark Beach!

In this very addicting game, you play as the shark exploring the waters of the great oceans! The oceans are filled with lots of surprises!

Eat all the fish to unlock more lives and levels! Collect the star fish power ups! But be careful - there are exploding sea mines attached to chains, dangerous missiles, and even sunken submarines to avoid!

Visit the Meat Store if you ever run out of meat to unlock more levels and lives! Check out the leaderboards to see who is on top!

*Please leave us a nice review if you enjoy this game!*
*As we cannot reply to AppStore reviews, please contact us at apprepublicllc@gmail.com for support!*
